item.title: Essential Softwares
item.description: This features a non-exhaustive list of my Essential Softwares for PC. Common Coding Visual Studio Code For Linux For Windows: choco install -y vscode Windows 10 Chocolatey: command-line-based package manager # Open cmd or powershell in Administrative mode Get-ExecutionPolicy # If it returns Restricted, then run Set-ExecutionPolicy AllSigned # or Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process # Install choco Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.
